name: Netflix & Chilll'd™
description: There’s something for everyone to watch on Netflix & flavors for everyone to enjoy from Ben & Jerry’s, so we’ve teamed up to bring you a chillaxing new creation that’s certain to satisfy any sweet or salty snack craving. It’s a flavorful world, and everyone is invited to grab a spoon.

name: Chip Happens
description: Sometimes “chip” happens and everything’s a mess, but we Nailed It! with this chip-filled limited batch. When smooth chocolate ice cream meets fudge chips & salty swirls, they pack a serious one-two crunch. The best part? There won’t be anything left to clean up.

name: Gimme S’more!™
description: It’s a gimme: there’s always room for s’more. And we’re pretty sure you’ll want to make s’more room in your freezer for this ‘shmallowy-rich, graham-good-‘n-chocolatey concoction now that it's full time flavor!.

name: Peanut Butter Half Baked®
description: If you were more than a little bit smitten with half baked®’s peanut buttery cousin when it was a Limited Batch, we expect you could be a whole lot smittener now that it’s a full-time flavor. Enjoy!

name: Berry Sweet Mascarpone
description: From the sweet blackberry and crazy creamy mascarpone ice creams to the shortbread cookies and fudge-dunked almonds, you’ll fall in love with this flavor faster than you can say “mass-car-po-nay.”

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Split
description: We’ve loaded our banana and chocolate ice creams with a chocolatey lot of bite-size PB surprises, so if you find your chocolate-covered, peanut-buttered banana fantasies aren’t fulfilled in every spoonful, we suggest a bigger spoon.

name: Justice ReMix'd ™
description: Now serving Justice ReMix’d: the flavor and action campaign dedicated to criminal justice reform. We’re proud to work with Advancement Project National Office in supporting reforms that invest in people instead of prisons. Together we can transform the system to deliver justice for all, instead of just some. Join us at benjerry.com/justice.

name: Boots on the Moooo’n™
description:
While Space Force works to get boots (back) on the moon, this cosmic concoction will launch your dreams into orbit. With fudgy astronaut cows & toffee meteors, space couldn't be any sweeter. Unless the moon was made out of sugar cookie dough. Which for this limited-time flavor, it actually is!
View All Of Our Netflix Inspired Flavors

name: Americone Dream®
description: Founded in fudge-covered waffle cones, this caramel-swirled concoction is the only flavor that gets a s'cream of approval from The Late Show host, Stephen Colbert. What's sweeter is this flavor supports charitable causes through The Stephen Colbert AmeriCone Dream Fund.

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie
description: Not long ago we scoop-toured through Texas asking you to elect the best of two Texas-inspired flavors. Thanks to you this bourbon-y whirl of pecans and cookies wrapped in whiskey-kissed caramel is now available Tex-clusively!

name: Brewed to Matter™
description: We're thrilled to add this made-to-matter, brownie batter-swirled batchful of coffee awesomeness to the Ben & Jerry's family of flavors. It packs a powerful pintful of goodness that's guaranteed to amaze you with every consciously concocted bite.

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
description: In your cheesecake dreams, is it like you’re spooning through a world of caramel cheesecake ice cream swirled with chocolate cookies in a wonderland filled with chunks of cheesecake? Hello? You can wake up now…

name: Cherry Garcia®
description: Our euphorically edible tribute to guitarist Jerry Garcia & Grateful Dead fans everywhere, it’s the first ice cream named for a rock legend and the most famous of our fan-suggested flavors.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
description: We knew we were onto something big when we made the world’s first batch of Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream in 1984. Today the flavor still reigns among our all-time most popular concoctions.

name: Chocolate Therapy®
description: You know how sometimes you just want to scream? You could just scream, or you could grab a spoon, get a grip, and treat yourself to some primal s'cream therapy of the sublimest chocolate kind. (Euphoria may occur upon tasting.)

name: Chubby Hubby®
description: Two tricksters convinced a co-worker this flavor really existed (it didn’t), then felt guilty & made him an actual batch packed with pretzels, peanut butter & fudge. He loved it, so did we, & the rest is history. Enjoy!

name: Chunky Monkey®
description: To create a flavor as fun as the name, we monkeyed around with bunches of test batches until we knew we had a winner: the nuttiest chocolatey-chunkiest concoction-gone-bananas you'll ever go ape for.

name: Cinnamon Buns®
description: Our cool salute to cinnamon buns is so cinnamon-streuseled & dough-loaded, there's no telling where the cinnamon buns end or the ice cream begins. That's because it's one fun flavor all the way through. Enjoy!

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!®
description: Somewhere between the creamy coffee coffee ice cream & the buzzbuzzbuzz of espresso fudge, it hits you: you’re wide awake & in lovelovelove.

name: Cold Brew Caramel Latte
description: If you’ve been looking for a more chillacious way to get your Ben & Jerry’s on, this dreamy latte-inspired ice cream made with cold brew coffee, rich sweet cream, & salt-kissed caramel is a mighty cool & euphoric motorvator.

name: Glampfire Trail Mix™
description: Inspired by glampfire tales of outdoorsy getaways filled with indoorsy perks, our trail mix is uber-chocolatey, nutty, marshmallowed-&-pretzeled, so you can get lost in the dessert without leaving the yurt.

name: Half Baked®
description: Ben & Jerry’s is proud to partner with fellow B Corps Greyston & Rhino Bakeries to bring you half baked. The incredible stories behind both the fudge brownies & cookie dough make this a flavor that not only tastes good, but does good.

name: Ice Cream Sammie
description: To capture the great taste of the classic ice cream sandwich in a flavor that’s not actually a sandwich, we packed our creamy-rich vanilla ice cream with chocolate sandwich cookies & swirls, best-captured, by you, with a spoon.

name: Milk & Cookies
description: How do you take classic milk-&-cookie goodness to a whole 'nother level of greatness? We don’t really know what that means, but we know this flavor’s loaded with the most euphoric assortment of cookies we ever dunked, chunked & swirled in our ice cream.

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
description: In case you’ve ever wondered what makes this wintry flavor so wicked cool to luge a spoon through: it’s the pepperminty excellence we packed in it, not to mention all those chocolate sandwich cookie moguls. Enjoy!

name: Minter Wonderland™
description: Imagine a wild ride through the wintriest, chocolate mintiest wonderland of ice cream filled with crunchy cookie swirls and marshmallowy drifts. Honestly, if this flavor was a toboggan, you’d already be on it.

name: New York Super Fudge Chunk®
description: In 1985, to make a name for ourselves in New York, we picked a New York kind of name and created a flavor packed with more kinds of chunks than ever before. We figured if the flavor was euphoric in New York, it would be everywhere. It was, and it is.

name: Oat of This Swirled™
description: When’s the best time to enjoy this blissful mix of brown sugar ice cream with otherworldly swirls of cinnamony oatmeal cookies? Any time between breakfast and bed, from now ‘til whenever.

name: Peanut Butter Cup
description: We interrupt our regularly scheduled programming to remind you how much you love ice cream that’s perfectly peanut buttery & peanut butter cuppity at the same time.

name: Peanut Butter World®
description: What makes Ben & Jerry's so euphoric? Some say it's the legendary creamy-richness of our flavor creations. Others say it's the tastebud-boggling combinations of spoon-bending chunks & perfect swirls. We say, "Enjoy!"

name: Phish Food®
description: “Ben was our neighbor through the woods & we're fond of ice cream. So we teamed up to create Phish Food®. A portion of our royalties from this flavor goes toward environmental efforts in Vermont's Lake Champlain Watershed. Enjoy!” - PHISH

name: Pistachio Pistachio
description: The name alone shows how much we love pistachios. But don't just take our word for it - let the flavor speak for itself!

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
description: We took the great taste of pumpkin cheesecake & gave it an ice cream upgrade, complete with a complementary graham cracker swirl, so it's more than just a great flavor: it's a first-class ticket to pumpkin wonderful.

name: S'mores
description: Remember when cookouts & campfires kindled your cravings for s'mores, glorious s’mores? We loaded this flavor with all the stuff that makes s’mores so glorious, so you can kindle your cravings whenever, no campfires required.

name: Salted Caramel Almond
description: What makes Ben & Jerry’s so euphoric? Some say it’s the legendary creamy-richness of our flavor creations. Others say it’s the tastebud-boggling combinations of spoon-bending chunks & perfect swirls. We say, “Enjoy!"

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: For strawberry cheesecake lovers who’ve always wanted to have their cheesecake & scoop it, too, we’ve created a flavor jam-packed with strawberry cheesecake-greatness & a fantastic graham-cracker swirl.

name: The Tonight Dough®
description: Inspired by the show & host we love staying up late for, here's a flavor you'll love spooning into - dedicated to SeriousFun Children's Network of global camps for children with serious illnesses. Learn more at seriousfunnetwork.org.

name: Triple Caramel Chunk®
description: Caramel lovers won’t want to miss a single moment of this must-eat caramel thrillogy, starring creamy caramel ice cream, gooey caramel swirls, and chewy caramel chunks. They probably won’t want it to end, either. Enjoy!

name: Urban Bourbon™
description: Want to enjoy a night on the town without leaving the house? Treat yourself to a caramel concoction that’s bold, toasty and bourbon-swirled, with lots of nuts and fudge for fun.

name: Vanilla
description: When you dig into this pint, you’ll find a rich, creamy Vanilla that’s more vanilla-tasting than any Vanilla you’ve ever tasted.

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge
description: If you’ve been looking for reasons to try something chunkless, this container holds a Vanilla-rich, fudge-luscious & caramel-gooey pintful of them. Enjoy!

name: Boom Chocolatta™ Cookie Core
description: As you slam dunk your spoon through creamy mocha & caramel to celebrate the epic chocolate cookie-spread core, your technique may not be perfect, but the victory’s perfectly delicious.

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
description: Instead of just giving you some sugar cookie dough, we thought you’d enjoy a core full even more, enwrapped in almond-kissed sweet cream & cherry ice creams packed with cookies & cherries. Do we love you or what?

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
description: What's it called when you find yourself spoon-deep in a rich center of cheesecake in the middle of a cool ice cream universe of chocolate, cheesecake & cookies? A Core encounter of the Ben & Jerriest kind.

name: Karamel Sutra® Core
description: Find your way to the ultimate ice cream experience with our Cores. Whether your primal urges lead you to the center of soft caramel or directly to the fudge chips, you’ll be in total control of your own ice cream destiny.

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
description: Find your way to the ultimate ice cream experience with our Cores. Whether your primal urges lead you to the center of peanut butter fudge or directly to the peanut butter cups, you’ll be in total control of your own ice cream destiny.

name: White Chocolate Raspberry Truffle Ice Cream
description: A truly exquisite ice cream inspired by fine chocolate truffles. We begin with pure white chocolate ice cream and swirl in satisfying chunks of chocolaty fudge truffles and a tangy raspberry ribbon.

name: Banana Peanut Butter Chip Ice Cream
description: Ribbons of rich peanut butter and bits of chocolate chips are folded into sweet banana ice cream to create this playfully indulgent flavor.

name: Bourbon Praline Pecan Ice Cream
description: Treat yourself to ice cream infused with smooth Bourbon sprinkled with brown sugar and given the perfect crunch with praline pecans.

name: Bourbon Vanilla Bean Truffle Ice Cream
description: A classic pairing made even better, enjoy creamy vanilla bean ice cream dotted with chocolate truffles and swirled with spicy Bourbon.

name: Butter Pecan Ice Cream
description: An American classic, revisited with our passion for singular flavor. We blend spoonful after spoonful of buttery roasted pecans with pure, sweet cream to create a delight like no other.

name: Caramel Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bar
description: Introducing New Soft Dipped Caramel Ice Cream Bars. A delicious pairing of indulgent caramel ice cream with a rich caramel swirl, covered in a soft chocolate truffle coating.

name: Caramel Cone Ice Cream
description: We balance a creamy blend of caramel ice cream and rich caramel swirls with the sweet crunch of chocolaty cone pieces to create a sweet, harmonious bite.

name: Caramel Cone Ice Cream Bar
description: Your favorite Caramel Pizzelle Bar, renamed. Golden ribbons of caramel in creamy vanilla gelato, enrobed in rich milk chocolate and crunchy italian style cone pieces.

name: Cherry Vanilla Ice Cream
description: The cherries of spring lend their delightful taste to our cherry vanilla ice cream. It is the perfect combination of pure, sweet cream and juicy black cherries.

name: Chocolate Ice Cream
description: Rich, creamy, and totally indulgent. Made from the finest cocoa and pure, sweet cream, our chocolate ice cream is the ultimate experience.

name: Chocolate Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
description: Our chocolate chocolate chip ice cream is the perfect combination of pure, sweet cream, fine cocoa, and chocolate chips. Truly a decadent ice cream experience.

name: Chocolate Dark Chocolate Ice Cream Bar
description: Between the classic rich and creamy chocolate ice cream inside, and the thick and crunchy dark chocolate coating finely drizzled on the outside, this is a chocolate connoisseur's delight.

name: Chocolate Fudge Non-Dairy Bar
description: Enjoy an indulgent non-dairy and vegan bar made from Belgian chocolate, cocoa, and swirls of chocolate fudge that’s finished with a decadent rice milk chocolate coating.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Ice Cream
description: We start with our legendary chocolate ice cream and swirl in ribbons of creamy, smooth peanut butter. The experience is an irresistible blend of flavors in every delicious mouthful.

name: Chocolate Salted Fudge Truffle Non-Dairy
description: Rich Belgian chocolate is blended with swirls of sweet salted fudge and chunks of fudge truffles to create an incredible non-dairy and vegan indulgence that isn't missing a thing.

name: Chocolate Sea Salt Caramel HEAVEN Light Ice Cream
description: Introducing new HEAVEN Chocolate Sea Salt Caramel light ice cream. Sink your spoon into dreamy chocolate light ice cream swirled with a ribbon of decadent sea salt caramel.

name: Coconut Caramel Non-Dairy
description: This one-of-a-kind non-dairy and vegan creation gives you more of what you love. Enjoy an irresistible combination of creamy coconut and ribbons of luscious caramel.

name: Coconut Caramel Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: Layers of creamy coconut and chocolate ice cream mingle with crisp Belgian milk chocolate and luscious caramel sauce for three times the indulgence.

name: Coconut Caramel Dark Chocolate Non-Dairy Bar
description: Velvety coconut cream is swirled with ribbons of luscious caramel sauce, then dipped in dark chocolate and finished with a rich, dark chocolate drizzle. It raises the bar for non-dairy and vegan indulgence.

name: Coffee Ice Cream
description: We roast the finest Brazilian coffee beans and brew them to perfection to bring out their rich, complex flavor. the combination of the brew with our pure, creamy ice cream awakens the senses.

name: Coffee Almond Crunch Ice Cream Bar
description: Coffee ice cream bar dipped in rich milk chocolate and almonds.

name: Coffee Vanilla Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: The rich complexity of our classic coffee ice cream paired with silky vanilla ice cream and an indulgent Belgian chocolate crunch.

name: Cold Brew Espresso Chip HEAVEN Light Ice Cream
description: Introducing new HEAVEN Cold Brew Espresso Chip light ice cream. Take a break with this rich and flavorful coffee light ice cream with a burst of chocolate espresso chips.

name: Cookies and Cream Ice Cream
description: Pieces of rich, chocolaty cookies are dunked in delicious, creamy vanilla ice cream to satisfy the milk-and-cookies kid in all of us.

name: Double Belgian Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
description: Your favorite Belgian chocolate ice cream, renamed. Our Belgian chocolate combines rich, velvety chocolate ice cream with finely shaved Belgian chocolate for a uniquely textured experience.

name: Dulce de Leche Ice Cream
description: Inspired by Latin America's treasured dessert, our dulce de leche ice cream is a delicious combination of caramel and sweet cream, swirled with ribbons of golden caramel.

name: Green Tea Ice Cream
description: We make our green tea ice cream from a highly sought-after Japanese matcha green tea, a ceremonial tea prized for its intense yet delicate essence. enjoy its soothing flavor enhanced with the richness of pure, sweet cream.

name: Honey Salted Caramel Almond Ice Cream
description: This decadent blend of honey ice cream, swirls of salted caramel, and crunchy toasted almonds was lovingly crafted to raise awareness for the honeybees and other pollinators who bring us so many of our favorite ingredients.

name: Irish Cream Cookie Squares
description: A rich chocolate cookie topped with ice cream that’s infused with Irish Cream before the entire square is dipped in decadent dark chocolate.

name: Irish Cream Brownie Ice Cream
description: Irish Cream infused into our ice cream with rich chocolate brownie pieces and a decadent fudge swirl.

name: Lemon Sorbet
description: Juicy, sun-ripened lemons create a tart yet sweet fruit sorbet. An indulgent treat with a delicate flavor that dazzles your tongue and refreshes your senses.

name: Lemon Raspberry White Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: Our Lemon Raspberry White Chocolate TRIO Crispy Layers weaves lemon and raspberry ice creams between perfectly crispy white chocolate and sweet raspberry sauce for a uniquely tantilizing treat.

name: Mango Ice Cream
description: Our ode to the tropical flavors of South America combines sweet mango ice cream and slices of juicy mango for a simply perfect treat.

name: Mango Sorbet
description: We blended juicy, tropical mangos into a smooth puree to create a refreshing treat with sweet fruit intensity.

name: Peanut Butter Cookie Squares
description: A chocolate cookie topped with our delicious peanut butter ice cream swirled with more creamy peanut butter, then dipped in milk chocolate and drizzled with a dark chocolate.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Fudge Non-Dairy
description: Instead of distracting dairy substitutes, we mix the creamiest peanut butter with ribbons of rich chocolate fudge and crunchy peanuts. It's the ultimate indulgence that just happens to be non-dairy and vegan.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Fudge Non-Dairy Bar
description: Smooth peanut butter is swirled with decadent chocolate fudge then coated in crisp dark chocolate and a dark chocolate drizzle for a playfully pure non-dairy and vegan indulgence.

name: Peppermint Bark Ice Cream
description: Celebrate the season with our rendition of this holiday classic. Rich white chocolate ice cream is blended with crunchy chocolaty peppermint bark and peppermint candy pieces.

name: Peppermint Bark Ice Cream Bar
description: Our peppermint bark ice cream bars start with decadent white chocolate ice cream, dipped in thick, dark chocolate, then speckled with cool peppermint candy pieces.

name: Pineapple Coconut Ice Cream
description: Let us take you on a voyage to a tropical island where exotic fruits ripen in the golden sun. We combine pure, sweet cream, tropical pineapple, and delectable coconut flavor for a truly indulgent ice cream experience.

name: Raspberry Sorbet
description: We blended delicious, ripe raspberries into a smooth puree for this tangy yet sweet fruit sorbet. It's refreshing and smooth with a sweet flavor intensity.

name: Rocky Road Ice Cream
description: Velvety swirls of marshmallow, roasted almonds, and our legendary chocolate ice cream come together in this playful ice cream delight.

name: Rosé & Cream Ice Cream
description:
Indulge in this new wine infused sweet cream ice cream folded together with a refreshingly tart Rosé flavored swirl.
*Contains Less Than 0.5% Alcohol by Volume

name: Ruby Cacao Crackle Pistachio Sweet Cream TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: Crispy and rich ruby cacao layers complement our smooth pistachio and sweet cream ice cream in this sensorial delight.

name: Rum Tres Leches Ice Cream
description: A Latin American inspired indulgence, we infuse smooth white Rum into our ice cream then add thick ribbons of dulce de leche and chunks of sweet Tres Leches cake.

name: Strawberry Ice Cream
description: We introduce sweet summer strawberries to pure cream and other natural ingredients. Because it's brimming with real fruit, the true flavor of our strawberries comes shining through.

name: Strawberry Waffle Cone HEAVEN Light Ice Cream
description: Introducing new HEAVEN Strawberry Waffle Cone light ice cream. Delight in the sweet taste of strawberry light ice cream dappled with crunchy pieces of chocolate-covered waffle cone.

name: Vanilla Cookie Squares
description: A dark chocolate cookie gets even more decadent when it's topped with our signature vanilla ice cream then dipped in a dark chocolate shell and a milk chocolate drizzle.

name: Vanilla Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bar
description: Introducing Soft Dipped Ice Cream Bars, a luscious combination of creamy vanilla ice cream covered in a soft chocolate truffle coating - the ultimate luxurious taste sensation.

name: Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
description: a unique twist to our iconic flavor. our ice cream blends Madagascar vanilla and pure, sweet cream with flecks of real vanilla beans, for a spicy and sweet delight.

name: Vanilla Blackberry Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: It begins with the classic taste of pure vanilla ice cream then, one layer of crispy Belgian chocolate later, becomes the vine-ripened intensity of blackberry ice cream.

name: Vanilla Caramel White Chocolate TRIO CRISPY LAYERS
description: This incredible combination of tastes and textures combines layers of vanilla and caramel ice cream with crunchy white chocolate and sweet caramel sauce.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Chip Ice Cream
description: Our delectable chocolate chips are swirled with our creamy, smooth vanilla ice cream, allowing two flavor titans to come together in this classically indulgent treat.

name: Vanilla Milk Chocolate Ice Cream Bar
description: Pure, sweet vanilla blends with sweet cream to make our incredibly smooth vanilla ice cream. Dipped in a milk chocolate coating and drizzled with fine milk chocolate, it's so thick and delicious you'll find it impossible to resist.

name: Vanilla Swiss Almond Ice Cream
description: An almond lover's delight. Our dry-roasted almonds are lightly coated with sweet chocolate and combined with our distinctive vanilla ice cream. Simple yet perfect.

name: Whiskey Hazelnut Latte Ice Cream
description:
This new spiked latte inspired treat is a delicious whiskey infused coffee ice cream blended with ribbons of hazelnut fudge and chocolate espresso flakes.
*Contains Less Than 0.5% Alcohol by Volume

name: ALPHONSO MANGO SORBETTO
description: Our simple and delicious Alphonso Mango Sorbetto is made with the finest ripe mangoes of Maharashtra, pure sugar, and fresh lemon. It’s the perfect dairy-free and vegan treat that everyone can enjoy.

name: BANANA CARAMEL CRUNCH
description: This flavor was inspired by a classic southern dessert: banana pudding. We started with two smooth and creamy layers of banana pudding gelato and included a layer of our signature Dulce de Leche. To top it off, we mixed in baked pie crust pieces for a unique Talenti twist.

name: BELGIAN CHOCOLATE GELATO
description: Our Belgian Chocolate gelato is made with melted, imported Belgian chocolate blended until smooth with fresh milk, cream, eggs and a hint of vanilla. When it comes to chocolate gelato, there’s good, there’s better, and there’s Belgian.

name: BLACK RASPBERRY CHOCOLATE CHIP GELATO
description: Tart and sweet, our Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip gelato combines black raspberries (from a lovely Oregon father/daughter-run raspberry farm, to boot) with rich chocolatey chips, all folded into a creamy gelato.

name: BLACK RASPBERRY VANILLA PARFAIT
description: This Layer was inspired by one of our favorite desserts – parfaits. It’s well-balanced and has a warm and satisfying taste that we are obsessed with. We start with Black Raspberry gelato which is crafted with black raspberry puree that comes from a farm in the Pacific Northwest. Next, we add oat crisps (which are similar to a crunchy oatmeal cookie) and a third layer of Blueberry sauce which is made from all-American blueberries. Finally we add a fourth layer of vanilla gelato and a fifth layer of oat crisps. We think this Black Raspberry Vanilla Parfait is the perfect dessert!

name: CARAMEL APPLE PIE GELATO
description: We start by steeping real cinnamon sticks in fresh milk and cream to make our delectable cinnamon gelato, then blend in bits of flaky piecrust, apple pieces, and a caramel swirl to create this one-of-a-kind Caramel Apple Pie gelato. Our methods might be Italian, but this recipe clearly leans American. This is special batch gelato, meaning it’s only available for a few months when it’s in season!

name: CARAMEL COOKIE CRUNCH GELATO
description: This is one of our best-selling flavors that people can’t get enough of (and we don’t blame them)! In our Caramel Cookie Crunch gelato recipe, we blend chocolate cookies into our delicious sweet cream gelato, then add a swirl of our one-of-a-kind dulce de leche. This caramelly combo results in one of our finest flavors to-date that will keep you coming back for more.

name: CARIBBEAN COCONUT GELATO
description: Fresh milk, cream, sugar and vanilla come together with tender coconut sourced from the Philippines—which is nowhere near the Caribbean. Just go with us on this one because geographical discrepancies taste amazing.

name: CHOCOLATE CHERRY CHEESECAKE
description: Cherry cheesecake is a classic dessert and we think our Chocolate Cherry Cheesecake Layer is a soon-to-be classic, as well. We started with a cheesecake gelato made with real cream cheese to taste exactly like cheesecake. In the second indulgent layer we added chocolate flakes to create a decadent texture. We followed this with a third layer of black cherry sauce made with U.S. grown black cherries. Next, we included another layer of cheesecake gelato. Finally, to replicate classic graham cracker crust, we crafted a fifth layer of graham cookie pieces.

name: CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER CUP GELATO
description: Milk chocolate gelato shares the stage with peanut butter and mini peanut butter cups to create our chocolate peanut butter cup gelato. Best-tasting party ever? We’d say “yes,” but our mouths are full.

name: COCONUT ALMOND CHOCOLATE GELATO
description: This flavor is like if Caribbean Coconut Talenti took its best friends on vacation. Coconut shreds, semi-sweet chocolatey flakes, and salted roasted almonds make quite a party.

name: COFFEE CHOCOLATE CHIP GELATO
description: Coffee sourced from Brazil and Colombia, slow cooked into fresh milk and cream, with semisweet chocolatey chips to give it a Clearly Talenti taste. Be careful. Our Coffee Chocolate Chip gelato could turn you into a coffee gelato snob.

name: COFFEE COOKIE CRUMBLE
description: Inspired by an affogato, Coffee Cookie Crumble, is a coffee lover’s dream. We began with cold brew gelato made with fair trade Brazilian and Colombian coffee beans and sprinkled in dark chocolate chunks. From there, we added vanilla gelato, a chocolate coffee sauce and finally traditional Italian Amaretti Cookies for a unique Talenti twist.

name: COLD BREW COFFEE SORBETTO
description: Our Cold Brew Coffee Sorbetto is created by perfectly blending fair-trade Brazilian and Colombian cold brew coffee with everything but the milk. If this sorbetto was a coffee, we’d call it a South Americano.

name: DARK CHOCOLATE CHERRY
description: This Layer was inspired by a cherry cordial and features the perfect pairing of dark chocolate and black cherry. We started with our Double Dark Gelato which features sophisticated hints of vermouth. Followed by chocolate flakes, a black cherry sauce, more Double Dark Gelato and a fifth layer of fudge truffles, this refined flavor is sure to please a crowd.

name: DARK CHOCOLATE SORBETTO
description: Recipe #59

name: DOUBLE DARK CHOCOLATE GELATO
description: Our Double Dark Chocolate gelato is blended with semisweet chocolate morsels and just a dash of vermouth. Is it possible to have a crush on a frozen dessert?

name: FUDGE BROWNIE GELATO
description: Fudge Brownie gelato. Real, gooey, perfect brownies blended into our dark chocolate gelato. And we added a swirl of rich, dark fudge because we clearly wanted to go all in on this pint.

name: HAZELNUT CHOCOLATE CHIP GELATO
description: Hazelnut combines with chocolatey chips and roasted hazelnut pieces to create this Clearly Talenti take on a classic. Hazelnut Chocolate Chip gelato: the clear choice if you’re sweet and nutty, and looking for your gelato doppelgänger.

name: LEMON BERRY PIE
description: Inspired by a classic summer dessert, this Layer pairs sweet and tart lemon gelato, all-American blueberries with pie crust pieces and graham cracker cookies for double the pie! We steeped lemon zest in fresh cream, milk and sugar to create a perfect lemon gelato.

name: MEDITERRANEAN MINT GELATO
description: Our Mediterranean Mint gelato uses real mint leaves steeped for 45 full minutes to get the perfect mint taste that is only amplified by the bittersweet chocolate flecks found throughout this iconic pint.

name: MINT FUDGE COOKIE
description: In this Layer, our Mediterranean Mint Gelato is the star of the show. So, of course, we began with our Mediterranean Mint Gelato made with fresh mint leaves. We used chocolatey cookies for an extra crunch in our second layer and swirled in a third layer of fudge sauce. Next, we used even more Mediterranean Mint Gelato in the fourth layer and finished with chocolate cookie pieces in the final layer.

name: OLD WORLD EGGNOG GELATO
description: Made with fresh milk, sugar, cream, egg yolks, pure vanilla extract, and nutmeg, our Old World Eggnog gelato recipe proves that, eggnog is meant to be eaten with a spoon.

name: ORGANIC BROWN BUTTER CARAMEL
description: Here’s a nutty, brown buttery idea. Organic caramel gelato, plus brown butter caramel (with a nutty cooked note to it), plus brown butter caramel swirls, plus a spoon, plus you. Let us know if that works for you.

name: ORGANIC CHOCOLATE MOUSSE GELATO
description: Don’t mousse out on this. Our Organic Chocolate Mousse gelato features organic dark chocolate gelato, is swirled with fudge, and is whipped to perfection. It’s handcrafted flavor at it’s finest—and fluffiest.

name: ORGANIC GINGER MATCHA GELATO
description: We love this flavor so matcha, we traveled all the way to Japan for it. Dive spoon first into the taste of green tea and organic ginger steeped in organic cream, blended with Japanese matcha. No passport needed.

name: ORGANIC OAK-AGED VANILLA GELATO
description: Some things get better with age. Like our new Organic Oak-Aged Vanilla gelato, the mature, more sophisticated cousin of our classic Madagascan Vanilla. It’s an elevated gelato crafted with Organic bourbon Vanilla and hints of oak. It’s a taste you’ll want to take your time with—but might not be able to.

name: PEANUT BUTTER FUDGE SORBETTO
description: Our rich, creamy, vegan Peanut Butter Fudge sorbetto features a decadent swirl of dairy-free fudge. Don’t be surprised if you find yourself asking “How did my peanut butter find its way to the freezer? And how does it taste this good?”

name: PEANUT BUTTER VANILLA FUDGE
description: Our Peanut Butter Vanilla Fudge layer started with a decadent peanut butter gelato that is made with real salted peanut butter, (ground peanuts and salt) followed by fair trade peanut butter cups. Next, we added a fudge sauce, a vanilla gelato and finished with peanut butter cookie pieces.

name: PEPPERMINT BARK GELATO
description: A white chocolate peppermint gelato and semisweet chocolatey flakes combine for our Peppermint Bark gelato that tastes like winter in a pint.

name: PUMPKIN PIE
description: Pumpkin Pie Layers is the ultimate holiday dessert in jar! We began with an indulgent layer of pumpkin gelato, followed by a layer of pie crust pieces. We then added a layer of rich brown sugar sauce (the same one we used in our original pumpkin pie flavor). And lastly, another layer of pumpkin gelato then more pie crust pieces!

name: ROMAN RASPBERRY SORBETTO
description: Packed with raspberries, this non-dairy, vegan sorbetto is intensely flavorful. With hints of lemon, it’s the perfect balance of tang and sweetness.

name: SOUTHERN BUTTER PECAN GELATO
description: Roasted pecans coated in butter and a dulce de leche swirl give our Southern Butter Pecan gelato its premium taste. Best enjoyed on rocking chair, on a porch, with a ceiling fan.

name: STRAWBERRY HIBISCUS SORBETTO
description: Sweet strawberries and real hibiscus flowers are blended together for a perfectly sweet and tart dairy-free sorbetto. There is ¼ cup of real strawberries in each serving! For a pop of color, we finish with a beautiful hibiscus swirl to complete this delicious refreshing sorbetto.

name: VANILLA FUDGE COOKIE
description: Vanilla Fudge Cookie features two of our iconic gelato flavors! We started with our Talenti Double Dark Gelato on top, then created a layer of chocolate cookie chunks, followed by a fudge sauce. Next, we mixed in our Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato and finally, a fifth layer of chocolatey waffle cones to add a savory and sweet crunch.

name: Natural Vanilla
description:
Our Original Vanilla Ice Cream. The way vanilla should taste! Breyers® Natural Vanilla is made with fresh cream, sugar, milk, and Rainforest Alliance Certified vanilla beans. Made with non-GMO sourced ingredients. Its distinctive taste brings out the natural goodness of your favorite fresh fruit desserts, like classic Apple Pie a la Mode or Peach Cobbler.

When William Breyer started his small ice cream business in Philadelphia in 1866, he based his recipes around simple and pure ingredients. Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream today still holds true to his ideals. What could be simpler than using ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk? To make things even sweeter, the milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over America because milk and fresh cream are so important in one of our most popular ice cream flavors and the taste you love. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Do you see those specks? Those are real vanilla beans. That heavenly vanilla in Natural Vanilla is also 100% sustainably sourced, so you can enjoy it even more, knowing that you’re supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar through our partnership with the Rainforest Alliance. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Try Breyers® Natural Vanilla yourself and see if those vanilla specks and refreshing milk and cream can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Homemade Vanilla
description:
Breyers® Homemade Vanilla ice cream is thick and smooth like it was just churned. It’s how homemade should taste, which makes it the perfect pairing to your favorite homemade treats. Try it with any one of our favorite recipes, like Rice Cereal Treat Ice Cream Sandwiches, Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Pies, or even a Banana Split Ice Cream Cake! Check out for more ideas!

Part of how we make Breyers® Homemade Vanilla so good is the high quality ingredients that we put in. We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love. We pledge to use only flavors and colors from natural sources, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla.

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. Breyers® Homemade Vanilla ice cream is thick and smooth like it was just churned.

name: Extra Creamy Vanilla
description:
Breyers® Extra Creamy Vanilla is our creamiest vanilla. Fresh cream and sweet vanilla come together to make your favorite treat creamier than ever before! Add it to Brownie Bowl Sundaes, Hot Fudge Sundaes, or blend it into a Creamy Mojito Shake. Extra Creamy Vanilla makes them all extra dreamy.

Part of our secret, is the quality of the milk and cream that we use to make our ice cream desserts! We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love.

Try Breyers® Extra Creamy Vanilla yourself and see if you that vanilla and refreshing milk and cream can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Chocolate
description:
Dig into a mouth-watering scoop of Breyers® Chocolate ice cream to find out why it's America's favorite. Rich, creamy ice cream with just the right amount of sweetness and real cocoa! Who can resist our Breyers® Chocolate ice cream? That fresh cream taste in Breyers® Chocolate ice cream is thanks in part to our partnerships with American farmers, who ensure the highest quality of dairy for our desserts.

And that rich chocolate satisfying your taste buds? That’s real cocoa we use. In fact, we only use real ingredients and colors and flavors from natural sources. Starting with real high quality ingredients is what we think makes the best chocolate ice cream.

Try it and see if you agree! Or give Breyers® Chocolate a twist with one of our fun recipes at .

name: Natural Strawberry
description:
Sun-ripened California strawberries – so good! AND swirled around in delicious Breyers® ice cream? What could be better? Our Breyers® Natural Strawberry ice cream is packed with strawberries picked at the peak of happiness!

Did we mention that our strawberries are also 100% sustainably sourced? Our Natural Strawberry is delicious all around. We start with ingredients like milk, fresh cream, sugar and strawberries to give you a delicious ice cream. Our strawberries are pretty great, but our milk and cream is special too! We only use 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. And to boot we use colors and flavors from natural sources and sustainable vanilla from Madagascar. Breyers® Strawberry is also made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients!

Give Breyers® Natural Strawberry ice cream a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip
description:
Cool, white mint ice cream with the real taste of mint and rich chocolatey chips – that’s what Breyers® Mint Chocolate Chip ice cream is all about. A classic dessert! And the perfect combination of mint flavor and rich chocolatey chips for your taste buds to enjoy.

What really makes our Breyers® Mint Chocolate Chip so special is our real mint extract. In fact, we pledge to use only colors and flavors from natural sources and sustainable vanilla. We care a lot about our dairy and that’s why we use 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Try Breyers® Mint Chocolate Chip and let us know if you agree that it’s the best! Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram.

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description:
Vanilla ice cream. Chocolate ice cream. Strawberry ice cream. All in one!? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan ice cream is the best of 3 worlds! Our Signature Natural Vanilla, Chocolate and Strawberry ice creams come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry is even made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients! But it’s not just any ice cream, it’s Breyers® so you’ll know that it’s made with high quality ingredients like sun-ripened California strawberries, real cocoa, and 100% sustainable vanilla from Madagascar! Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. When our founder, William Breyer, started his ice cream operation in 1866 in Philly he was very concerned about the quality of the ingredients that he put into his ice cream. Some 150 years later we still follow his commitments to using high quality ingredients to make great tasting ice cream.

Give Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry ice cream a try and let us know at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Delights Creamy Chocolate
description:
Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Creamy Chocolate ice cream was 270 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream.

We start with high quality ingredients, naturally sourced flavors, and all American dairy. This reduced fat ice cream will leave your taste buds in disbelief. And it’s even a good source of protein!

Try our rich, creamy low-fat chocolate ice cream made with real cocoa. It’s the ultimate chocolate-lover’s dream! We can't wait to hear which pint is your favorite flavor! Be sure to visit us at to learn more about our wide variety of delicious desserts! You can also check us out on Instagram @Breyers to see lots of delicious photos.

name: Delights Vanilla Bean
description:
Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Vanilla Bean ice cream was 260 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream.

We start with high quality ingredients, naturally sourced flavors, and all American dairy. This low fat ice cream will leave your taste buds in disbelief. And it’s even a good source of protein!

Try our smooth low-fat vanilla ice cream, made with real vanilla beans, and fresh cream. We can't wait to hear which pint is your favorite flavor! Be sure to visit us at to learn more about our wide variety of delicious desserts! You can also check us out on Instagram at @Breyers to see lots of delicious photos

name: French Vanilla
description:
Ooo la la! It’s Breyers® French Vanilla ice cream! A classic twist on your favorite Breyers® vanilla. The signature taste of Breyers® French Vanilla was inspired by the traditional French custard, and is our richest, most indulgent Vanilla. It’s the perfect complement to delicious breakfast-style desserts, like French Toast a la Mode, French Vanilla Puff Pancakes, or a Fruit Salad Parfait.

Though inspired by French tradition, this tub of Breyers® still has a lot of American pride. Each Breyers® French Vanilla is filled with 100% Grade A milk and cream, from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Try it yourself and leave us a review on ! Or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: CarbSmart™ Vanilla
description:
Watching your grams of sugar or carbs? Try our Breyers® CarbSmart™ Creamy Vanilla, with 110 calories, 4g net carbs, 4g sugar, and 4g fiber+ per serving! Sometimes, you just need a treat that you can grab and go and maybe even eat in four bites!

We hope that you give our Creamy Vanilla a try and see if you love them! Or, give our other flavors a try like Creamy Chocolate, Vanilla Bars, and our Fudge Bars!

name: No Sugar Added Vanilla
description:
Simply delicious and satisfying. Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla is a great way to enjoy dessert time, without all the guilt. It’s the vanilla you love and expect from Breyers®, without sugar – what can be sweeter? Your sweet tooth can indulge in the smooth, creamy vanilla that has just the perfect amount of sweet.

Our Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla abides by our Pledge to use 100% Grade A milk and fresh cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and vanilla from sustainably sourced farms in Madagascar, in partnership with the Rainforest Alliance.

Check out to snag some near you and leave us a review to share your love!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: OREO®
description:
Breyers® vanilla and heaps of OREO® cookies? Yes please! If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and OREO® cookies. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® OREO® Cookies & Cream? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those chunks of 100% REAL OREO® cookies and will be sure to bring a smile to your face.

Using 100% REAL OREO® is just one way that we’re keeping to our pledge to use high quality ingredients. Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Give Breyers® OREO® Cookies & Cream a try and let us know your thoughts at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: OREO® & CHIPS AHOY!® 2in1
description:
OREO® or CHIPS AHOY!® cookies? With Breyers® 2in1 you don't have to choose! You can get the best of both worlds - vanilla Breyers® loaded with pieces of REAL OREO® cookies, swirled together with caramel Breyers® AND pieces of REAL CHIPS AHOY!® cookies. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert.

We hope you agree that our OREO® & CHIPS AHOY!® flavor is top notch! Plus, our milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. Check out to find some near you!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Vanilla Caramel
description:
Torn between sweet or salty for dessert? Give in to the perfect balance between the two in Breyers® Vanilla Caramel. A classic blend of rich vanilla and indulgent caramel. It’s our signature Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream with a luscious caramel swirl. What can be better?

That caramel is a delicious addition to our marvelous vanilla made with ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk. Our milk and cream is 100% Grade A and comes from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious desserts.

We hope that you try our Breyers® Vanilla Caramel and agree! Let us know by leaving a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram for the latest news and products!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Vanilla Caramel Gelato Indulgences
description: Give in to the temptation of creamy vanilla gelato, luscious caramel sauce and gourmet caramelly curls.

name: Chocolate Mint
description:
Breyers® rich cocoa ice cream with swirls of real peppermint extract? Pass that Breyers® Chocolate Mint ice cream over this way! With the perfect combination of sweet and cool mint, this flavor is a must try!

Part of what makes our Breyers® Chocolate Mint so good is that real peppermint extract that we use! In fact, we only use colors and flavors from natural sources because we believe it’s what makes great tasting ice cream. We honor the spirit of the Pledge of Purity with our own pledge to use 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**.

We hope that when you give Breyers® Chocolate Mint a try you’ll agree that it’s our high quality ingredients that make a difference. Did you love it? Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **In Breyers® Cookies & Candies, our product, before the inclusion of other cookies, candies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Vanilla Fudge Twirl
description:
Rich fudge swirled through creamy smooth vanilla makes for a 'twirling' good time in Breyers® Vanilla Fudge Twirl! Twirl around in enjoyment!

What makes our dessert this good? In part, it’s our vanilla flavor that comes from 100% sustainable farms in Madagascar and is certified by Rainforest Alliance. Our milk and cream play a big role in making a great tasting Vanilla Fudge Twirl. We partner with American farmers for only 100% Grade A milk and cream from cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources**, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla.

We hope you agree that’s what makes our Breyers® Vanilla Fudge Twirl so good! Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: CarbSmart™ Chocolate
description:
Discover the Breyers® CarbSmart™ Chocolate treat! It's perfect when you want something sweet for dessert while still eating healthy!

Breyers® CarbSmart™ proves that low carbs doesn't mean less taste. Make sweeter family moments while keeping carb-watchers happy by the bar or by the scoop. Treat yourself to a scoop of Breyers® CarbSmart™ rich Chocolate — 5g net carbs, 110 calories, 3g sugar, 4g fiber per serving!+

+SEE NUTRITION FACTS FOR MORE INFORMATION +NET CARBS ARE CALCULATED BY SUBTRACTING TOTAL DIETARY FIBER AND SUGAR ALCOHOL FROM TOTAL CARBOHYDRATES

description:
Have a lactose sensitivity? No problem! Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Chocolate! It’s the same great chocolate, just without the lactose*! A creamy, delicious dessert made with real cocoa.

That smooth creamy taste is in part thanks to our 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows now treated with artificial growth hormones**. Mixed together with rich cocoa – makes that delicious Breyers® Chocolate that you know and love. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes delicious chocolate desserts.

Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Vanilla and see if you agree! Leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*99% Lactose Free **The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description:
Vanilla. Chocolate. Strawberry. All in one!? And with no sugar added? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan is the best of 3 worlds with the added bonus of no sugar added! Our Signature vanilla, chocolate and strawberry Breyers® come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry is even made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients! But it’s not just any dessert, it’s Breyers® so you’ll know that it’s made with high quality ingredients like sun-ripened California strawberries, real cocoa, and 100% sustainable vanilla from Madagascar! Our milk and cream are 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

Give Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry a try and let us know at ! *The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter
description:
Love ice cream but can’t stomach the dairy? Have no fear! Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter is here! Made with real almond milk and filled with luscious swirls of real peanut butter – there’s no milk in sight. If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and spoonfuls of peanut butter. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter? And now, even those who usually shy away from delicious ice cream can rejoice and join in! Really, who can say there’s ever too much of a good thing – like peanut butter and Non-Dairy Breyers®? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those beautiful swirls of peanut butter and will be sure to bring a smile to your face.

We hope you agree that our Non-Dairy frozen almond milk dessert packed with real peanut butter is simply a delightful treat. Give it a try and leave us a review at . Real vanilla and luscious peanut butter collide to give you a real Breyers® moment — and this time, it’s completely non-dairy, made with real almond milk! Enjoy this creamy and nutty almond milk frozen dessert, with the Breyers® quality you trust.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake Gelato Indulgences
description:
Discover Breyers® Raspberry Cheesecake Gelato Indulgences ®. Get wrapped up in silky cheesecake gelato, luscious raspberry sauce and gourmet graham crumbles.

Breyers® Gelato Indulgences is the perfect way to take any moment from ordinary to extraordinary. Each flavor is composed of beautiful rosettes of creamy gelato, draped in luscious sauce and finished with gourmet toppings. See for yourself how our unique trio of textures delivers a truly special and indulgent dessert experience, unlike any other.

name: No Sugar Added Caramel Swirl
description:
Savor the flavors of vanilla and rich salted caramel and pieces of toffee swirled throughout Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl. All the rich, creamy taste—with no added sugar!

Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl is a great way to enjoy dessert time, without all the guilt. It’s the vanilla and caramel you love and expect from Breyers® plus chunks of toffee pieces, without sugar – what can be sweeter? Your sweet tooth can indulge in the smooth, creamy vanilla and caramel that has just the perfect amount of sweet.

Our Breyers® No Sugar Added Salted Caramel Swirl uses 100% Grade A milk and fresh cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and vanilla from sustainably sourced farms in Madagascar, in partnership with the Rainforest Alliance.

The best news of all is that you can enjoy your favorite cookies and candies combined with the quality of Breyers®. name: Cookies & Cream
description:
Take a milk and cookie break. Dive into Breyers® rich and creamy vanilla packed with scrumptious, cream-filled chocolate cookie pieces in Breyers® Cookies & Cream! That delicious vanilla taste mixed with chocolate cookies – what a combination!

Our vanilla flavor is pretty special – it’s 100% sustainably farmed in Madagascar and is certified by Rainforest Alliance! We work with Rainforest Alliance to help farmers in Madagascar take care of their farms and families. Find out more about our Vanilla Story at . 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*, colors and flavors from natural sources**, and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla are all part of what makes Breyers® Cookies & Cream delicious!

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream
description:
Love ice cream but can’t stomach the dairy? Have no fear! Breyers® Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream is here! Made with real almond milk and filled with loads of 100% REAL OREO® cookies – there’s no milk in sight. If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and OREO® cookies. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream? And now, even those who usually shy away from delicious ice cream can rejoice and join in!

Really, who can say there’s ever too much of a good thing – like OREO® cookies and Non-Dairy Breyers®? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those chunks of real OREO® cookies and will be sure to bring a smile to your face. We hope you agree that our Non-Dairy frozen almond milk dessert packed with OREO® cookies is simply a delightful treat. Give it a try and leave us a review at .

name: Vanilla Chocolate
description:
Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream and Breyers® Chocolate ice cream, together in one tub? It’s the best of both worlds! No need to choose your favorite dessert, when you can have both in one scoop.

It’s the simplicity of Natural Vanilla made with real Madagascar vanilla bean specks and Chocolate made with real cocoa. We believe that it’s the quality of our ingredients that makes great tasting ice cream. Just like William Breyer who, in 1866, started his ice cream operation in Philadelphia, we today also follow a commitment to high quality ingredients. More than 150 years later and we are still making your favorite Natural Vanilla and Chocolate with high quality ingredients.

Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate is also made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients. We start with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over the U.S. because milk and fresh cream are so important in our ice cream flavors and the taste you love.

Share your love for Breyers® Vanilla Chocolate at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Black Raspberry Chocolate
description:
Mouth-watering black raspberry swirls and rich chocolatey chips come together to make Breyers® Black Raspberry Chocolate a luscious treat. Raspberries and chocolate go hand in hand, so our Black Raspberry Chocolate frozen dessert is a must to try.

Though deliciously pink, our products are made with only colors and flavors from natural sources*. We start with ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk to make Black Raspberry Chocolate extra special. Breyers® Black Raspberry Chocolate combines fruit and chocolate in the best way!

name: Chocolate Truffle
description:
It’s every chocolate-lover’s dream! Savor the creamy, delicious taste of Breyers® dark chocolate ice cream and pieces of dark chocolate truffles in every bite of Breyers® Chocolate Truffle!

Chocolate on chocolate – what could be better? Breyers® Chocolate Truffle is made with real cocoa and 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*.

We hope you give Breyers® Chocolate Truffle a try and agree. Leave us a review at to let us know!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Ice Cream Cake
description:
Breyers® Ice Cream Cake is bite after bite of one of America's favorite party treats. Between layers of our signature Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream, is Breyers® Chocolate Ice Cream, bursting with loads of chocolatey crunchies. It's the perfect treat for even the smallest occasion.

Our vanilla is 100% sustainably sourced and through our partnership with Rainforest Alliance so your Breyers® Ice Cream Cake is also supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the delicious vanilla desserts, and that’s why we use 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones* and sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. Make it a party and try our Breyers® Ice Cream Cake for your next celebration!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. **Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: Coconut Fudge
description:
Sweet, creamy coconut and coconut pieces get delicious with chocolatey fudge swirled throughout Breyers® Coconut Fudge. It's the best of both worlds!

Need a tropical escape with some chocolate swirled in? Here it is! We can almost feel the ocean breeze. While you’re imagining being by the beach, take note that Breyers® is made with 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We believe that it’s our high quality ingredients that make Breyers® Coconut Fudge so great! We hope you agree.

Give it a try and leave us a review at or follow us @Breyers on Instagram!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter
description:
Delicious Breyers® Chocolate Ice Cream is thoroughly swirled through with real peanut butter, making Chocolate Peanut Butter one spoon-lickin' good ice cream, perfect for sharing….or not! It’s the Breyers® Chocolate ice cream you love with swirls of peanut butter. What could go wrong?

We start with fresh cream, sugar, and milk and real cocoa. We’re obsessed with the quality of the ingredients that we put into our desserts and that’s why we partner with American farmers for 100% Grade A milk and cream.

We hope you give Breyers® Chocolate Peanut Butter a try and agree. Leave us a review at to let us know!

name: Natural Vanilla Snack Cups 10ct
description:
Discover Breyers® Vanilla Ice Cream Snack Cups. Enjoy the delicious taste of America's favorite vanilla in a perfectly portioned 3 ounce serving.

What could be simpler than using ingredients like fresh cream, sugar, and milk? To make things even sweeter, the milk and cream are 100% Grade A and come from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We partner with our farmers all over America because milk and fresh cream are so important in one of our most popular ice cream flavors and the taste you love.Do you see those specks? Those are real vanilla beans.

That heavenly vanilla in Natural Vanilla is also 100% sustainably sourced, so you can enjoy it even more, knowing that you’re supporting farmers and their families in Madagascar through our partnership with the Rainforest Alliance. We believe that the quality of our ingredients makes the most delicious vanilla ice cream.

Try Breyers® Natural Vanilla yourself and see if you those vanilla specks and refreshing milk and cream can scoop up some smiles in your family. Want to give your dessert a twist? Check out our recipes at for fun and easy ideas!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Chocolate Snack Cups 10ct
description:
Breyers® Chocolate ice cream - rich, creamy, with just the right amount of sweetness and real cocoa! Who can resist? It’s deliciously snackable in a perfectly portioned 3 fl oz. serving ice cream cup.

America loves chocolate ice cream and so do we! That fresh cream taste in Breyers® Chocolate ice cream is thanks in part to our partnerships with American farmers, who ensure the highest quality of dairy for our desserts.

And that rich chocolate satisfying your taste buds? That’s real cocoa we use. In fact, we only use real ingredients and colors and flavors from natural sources. Starting with real high quality ingredients is what we think makes the best chocolate ice cream.

Try it and see if you agree! Or give Breyers® Chocolate a twist with one of our fun recipes at .

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: CINNABON®
description:
Calling all cinnamon roll lovers! We teamed up with CINNABON®, one of our favorite treats, to create our bakery-inspired Breyers® CINNABON®.

Bring home the magic of CINNABON® and Breyers® with swirls of gooey cinnamon roll flavor and delicious dough bites in a sweet cinnamon flavored base. It’s a twist on your classic CINNABON® cinnamon roll that will take your senses on a tasty trip.

Not only delicious, but also made with high quality ingredients like fresh cream, sugar and milk. In fact, our milk and cream is 100% Grade A from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. We use colors and flavors from natural sources and only sustainably farmed fruit and vanilla**. Our commitment to using high quality ingredients goes back more than 150 years to give you a great tasting dessert.

Try out our Breyers® CINNABON® and let us know what you think at !

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. ** Our product, before the inclusion of any candies, cookies, sauces or fruit from other suppliers, will fully abide by this claim. Raspberries are not sustainably farmed.

name: CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bar
description:
Watching your grams of sugar or carbs? Try our Breyers® CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bars, with 60 calories, 4g net carbs, 4g sugar, and 3g fiber+ per serving! Sometimes, you just need a treat that you can grab and go and maybe even eat in four bites!

We start with fresh 100% Grade A cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. Our fruit and vanilla is sustainably farmed and we only use colors and flavors from natural sources. So, while you’re walking around and enjoying the 4 grams of sugar of a Breyers® CarbSmart™ Caramel Swirl Bar, you know that even after more than 150 years, we’re following the spirit of William’s Pledge of Purity.

We hope that you give our Caramel Swirl Bars a try and see if you love them! Or, give our other flavors a try like Almond Bars, Vanilla Bars, and our Fudge Bars!

*The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows. +SEE NUTRITION FACTS FOR MORE INFORMATION +NET CARBS ARE CALCULATED BY SUBTRACTING TOTAL DIETARY FIBER AND SUGAR ALCOHOL FROM TOTAL CARBOHYDRATES
